question: How are my Rebate Rewards determined?
answer:
We have designed a completely transparent rebate reward calculation mechanism to ensure that every effort you make receives precise rewards. All amounts are ultimately based in US dollars (USD). If the original currency of the order is not US dollars, the conversion rate will be based on the company's regulations at the time:

• Order Amount: The total order amount when the customer places an order, converted to US dollars according to the exchange rate at the time.
• Product Actual Amount: This is the basis for calculating rebate rewards. The calculation method is "Order Amount" minus all additional costs, including discounts, taxes, and shipping fees.
• Gross Payout: "Product Actual Amount" multiplied by your current "BEL level corresponding reward percentage."
• Net Payout: After deducting 20% statutory withholding tax (WHT) from the "Gross Amount," this is the final amount you actually receive.

question: When will I receive my Rebate Rewards?
answer: We will automatically send your approved rebate reward net amount from the previous cycle to your designated account on the 12th of each month. Your Payout Amounts must reach a minimum of $100 USD (payment threshold) to receive payment on the payment date.

question: What is the procedure if a customer returns a product?
answer: Rebate Rewards are contingent upon completed and final sales. Should a customer return a product within the designated cooling-off period, the transaction is considered invalid, and the associated reward is voided. Only successful, non-refunded transactions are eligible for rewards. Your dashboard provides a real-time, accurate status of all transactions.

question: How do I track my referrals?
answer: You can monitor your referral performance by logging into the partner portal and accessing your dashboard. The dashboard provides a comprehensive overview of your key metrics, including clicks, conversion rates, and real-time earnings, offering the insights necessary to refine and optimize your strategy.

question: How frequently is the dashboard data updated?
answer: The dashboard provides live data. All metrics are updated in real-time as events occur, allowing for immediate feedback on your campaigns and enabling you to make informed decisions promptly.

question: What are the different partner level?
answer:
We have planned a clear growth path for you. Your partner level will be evaluated and adjusted on January 1st of each year based on your total accumulated turnover for the previous year. Higher levels represent richer rewards and more prestigious treatment.

Reward percentages and promotion standards for each level:

• Builder: 2% (Your starting point)
• Enabler: 2% (Annual turnover of $20,000)
• Explorer: 3% (Annual turnover of $100,000)
• Leader: 5% (Annual turnover of $200,000)

question: Is there a cost to join this opportunity?
answer: No. There are no application fees or membership dues required to join the partner program. We believe in mutual success, and your expertise and passion are the only prerequisites for participation.

question: Am I permitted to use multiple promotional methods?
answer: Yes. We encourage a multi-channel promotional strategy. You may share your unique referral link or code on your website, blog, social media platforms, newsletters, and other appropriate forums to maximize your reach and earnings potential.

question: Is it possible to change my referral ID?
answer: Your referral ID serves as a unique identifier for tracking purposes and is permanently assigned upon account creation to ensure data integrity. Therefore, it is generally not possible to change it. In exceptional circumstances, you may submit a request to our support team for review.

question: What marketing resources are available to me?
answer: We deeply understand that quality content is the key to success. In the "Get Resource" section of the BEL Portal, we have prepared rich and professional marketing resources for you, including brand promotional videos, product introductions, application cases, graphic materials, and various copywriting templates, aimed at helping you easily plan and execute professional, effective marketing campaigns.

question: How can I receive assistance if I encounter an issue?
answer: We are here to support you. We recommend first consulting the FAQ section in the portal. If you cannot find a solution there, please submit a support ticket through the portal or our website's contact form. Our dedicated support team will respond to your inquiry promptly.
